Display current time on the home screen
A notification allowing to open 3 applications can be displayed when you leave the home screen.
(Limited to 3 applications because no more buttons can be shown on a notification)
From the home screen, swipe down to display the favorites panel and swipe up to hide it. If you swipe up when the favorites panel is hidden, it will display the complete list of applications.

When you are at the top of the applications list, you can swipe down to return to the home screen. In case you just opened the list and have not scrolled yet, you will need to swipe down twice to return to the home screen.
Put your finger a few moments on an application to access its system settings.
At the bottom of the favorites panel, hold the button to display the menu of the launcher. This menu allows to refresh the applications list, define the favorites applications and open the settings.

The applications list and their icons are refreshed only after some events (start, application added or removed, icon pack modified). If something does not feel right, you should try to refresh the applications list manually. You can check the last time it was done on top of the applications list.
